bill_title: permit the compassionate use of medical cannabis.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to permit the compassionate use of medical cannabis. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That the code be amended by adding a NEW SECTION to read: The compassionate use of medical cannabis is permitted and the use shall be regulated. 100 copies were printed on recycled paper by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.161 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in Senate and referred to
Withdrawn at the Request of the Prime Sponsor
